attributes.action: Allow 16 and 17 year olds to vote in a 2nd referendum on the EU
attributes.additional_details: 16 and 17 year olds were allowed to vote in the Scottish independence referendum.
attributes.background: 16 and 17 year olds have strong opinions on whether the UK should be a member of the EU And their voices have not been heard.  This demographic are the ones who are most affected by the outcome of the referendum.
